"Hm? Yeah, I'm taking a break.": "It'd be great it I could veg out and do nothing, but if someone sees me doing that I could end up with some crazy orders on my lap. So I gotta look busy."
"That's why I figure if I drag you with me to the Caverns I can take it easy and make you do all the heavy lifting. What do you say?"
